attributes.action: Give the European union Nicola Sturgeon
attributes.additional_details: Nicola Sturgeon is the best thing to happen to Scotland and deserves to given to the European union so they can give her a job there
attributes.background: I am petitioning to give the European Union Nicola Sturgeon because she really does a great job running Scotland

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for, and we can't accept petitions which call for actions with regard to named individuals.

Decisions about whether to seek to work for the European Union are a matter for individuals, not the UK Government or Parliament.
